message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $180 is a bit steep for me.  I'm interested, but I'm only willing to pay $100.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $160.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $160 is still a little too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $120, but that's my absolute limit.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $145.
